column6: there was a fire in the Hotel Paradise Angkor Villa in Sla Kram.------The reason is unclear and a fire truck was attending the scene.------UPDATE: A room caught on fire in the hotel. Several firefighting trucks managed to put out the blaze by about 5 pm. There was damage to the building
column7: but no reported injuries.------An electrical fault has been given as the cause.------SRPOST
